mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.client_id AS "client.id", a.warehouse_id AS "warehouse.id", a.item_id AS "item.id"
LEFT JOIN tb_customer client ON client.id = a.client_id LEFT JOIN tb_warehouse warehouse ON warehouse.id = a.warehouse_id LEFT JOIN tb_icitem item ON item.id = a.item_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_jurisdiction( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, client_id, warehouse_id, item_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{client.id}, #{warehouse.id}, #{item.id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_jurisdiction SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, client_id = #{client.id}, warehouse_id = #{warehouse.id}, item_id = #{item.id} WHERE id = #{id}
